review: I was pleasantly surprised with the Fire Stick's performance as I have a relatively slow internet connection using DSL.  The picture is clear and steady with only an occasional millisecond long stop & go.  Much of the content is free to Prime subscribers however, there are charges on some of the programs.  When and if Amazon starts broadcasting some of the news stations I might cancel my cable service!  :-)
